data.prayer: Father, be a refuge and strength for the hurting in Tver‘, Russia today.
data.verse: God is our refuge and strength, an ever-present help in trouble.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Tver‘, Russia
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Lord, for the leaders in the state of Tver', let the eyes of their hearts be enlightened in order that they may know the hope to which they are called.
data.verse: I pray that the eyes of your heart may be enlightened in order that you may know the hope to which he has called you, the riches of his glorious inheritance in his holy people, and his incomparably great power for us who believe.

data.section_summary: On average, 97 babies will be born in the next 100 hours to families who might know about God culturally, but likely have no relationship with Jesus in Tver‘, Russia.
data.prayer: Jesus, reveal yourself to these new families.
God, we pray for the believers in Tver‘, Russia that they will know how to spend an hour in prayer with you.
Father, we pray that the people of Tver‘, Russia will learn to study the Bible, understand it, obey it, and share it.
Lord we ask you on behalf of the Kyrgyz people. 0.7% are known to be believers. Oh God, please share with them the great gift of your son Jesus and your kingdom.
Spirit, awaken the sleepers and call them to repent and be baptized in the state of Tver'. Set an urgency in their hearts.
data.verse: And now why do you wait? Rise and be baptized and wash away your sins, calling on his name.’

data.prayer: Spirit, give the believers of the the state of Tver' unity and humility as they work to bring the kingdom to new people and places.
Father, please raise up new apostles to pioneer the growth of the church in Tver'.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up
